articles.title: Adani Power jumps 5% after BSE raises circuit limit - The Economic Times
articles.description: Adani Power stocks rose over 5% after the Bombay Stock Exchange increased the circuit limit of the stock from 5% to 20%. Adani Green Energy, Adani Transmission, and Adani Wilmar are among other stocks whose circuit limits have been revised to 10%. The move wi…

articles.title: TCS COO Salary: TCS top brass salary jumps 120% in three years, former CEO Rajesh Gopinathan took home nearly - CNBCTV18
articles.description: TCS’ former CEO Rajesh Gopinathan took home nearly Rs 30 crore in FY23, which still lower than what his peers at HCL Tech, Infosys, Tech Mahindra and Wipro received as compensation in the previous fiscal.
